With the recent news and discussion around online school and whether kids are better off at home, we asked one of our experts her thoughts. And here is what she said:

"In my 20 years of work in online learning across America and around the globe, the one constant has been the fact that every learner is unique. A high-quality online school is tailor-made for each student while also providing a vibrant community of peers and teachers. It took a pandemic for American education to embrace the idea that 'one size does not fit all' when it comes to kids' learning, and that smart use of technology can make the school fit the student instead of requiring that it always be the other way round." -Mickey Revenaugh, Co-founder of Connections Academy
